dc_description_s: Apollo, Pa., Armstrong Co, Dec. 1889. 1 map on 3 sheets : col. ; on sheets 64 x 54 cm.; Statement of responsibility: Sanborn-Perris Map Co., Limited.  Partial cadastral map.  Title from sheet 1.  Copyright 1889 by the Sanborn-Perris Map Co. Limited.""  Oriented with north to the upper right on some sheets.  ""Dec. 1889.""  Includes key, ""Specials"" index, sheet index map, notes, and text."". Scale approximately 1:600. 50 ft. to an in.
